server.connection
Class MessageConnection

java.lang.Object
  server.connection.MessageConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
Communicable
public class MessageConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements Communicable

Implements the Communicable interface for a connection to the GUI, which uses Message as its communication Protocol.

getMessage

public ServerMessage getMessage()
Description copied from interface: Communicable
This blocks until a message is sent from the client, at which put the method returns. This is useful in a loop to constantly get input from the client.

Specified by:
getMessage in interface Communicable
Returns:
message sent from the client
